/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's vibrant atmosphere. The street, lined with trees and buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a unique perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively and energetic mood of the city.
